attributes.action: Support President Donald Trump in making his State Visit to the United Kingdom
attributes.additional_details: The UK has welcomed world leaders from countries with far worse records on human rights than the newly elected President Trump. China and Saudi Arabia to name but two - where were the protests against these leaders?
attributes.background: On the back of President Trump's executive order to temporarily ban citizens of certain countries from entering the United States, and resultant calls for President Trump to be prevented from visiting the UK on a State Visit, I wish to start a petition that supports President Trump's visit
